# Viktor Maruna

> Cloud Solution Architect & Data Engineer | Specializing in Data & AI

Viktor Maruna is a Cloud Solution Architect and Data Engineer based in Slovakia, with deep expertise in designing and building Data & AI solutions. His work spans cloud architecture on Microsoft Azure, data platform engineering, generative AI, large language models (LLMs), and machine learning.

## Expertise

- **Cloud Architecture**: Microsoft Azure, cloud-native solutions, scalable infrastructure
- **Data Engineering**: Data pipelines, data platforms, ETL/ELT, data lakes, lakehouses
- **AI & Machine Learning**: Generative AI, large language models (LLMs), ML solutions, AI-powered applications
- **Data & AI Strategy**: Enterprise data & AI architecture, solution design, technical advisory
